FuncDef:
The dei enable command maps the drop eligible indicator (DEI) field in a VLAN tag to the drop priority.
The undo dei enable command cancels the configuration of the DEI field in a VLAN tag as the drop priority. The dei enable command maps the drop eligible indicator (DEI) field in a VLAN tag to the drop priority. The undo dei enable command cancels the configuration of the DEI field in a VLAN tag as the drop priority. By default, the DEI field in a VLAN tag is not used as the drop priority.
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,400GE-L2 view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,Layer 2 Eth-Trunk interface view,Interface group view
